website_summaries.verdict: A solid kit with the well-built tools most users need without unnecessary extras. Though the battery and charger could be better, these four tools are crafted to handle serious work.
pros: Features hammer drill, impact driver, reciprocating saw, and a convenient hands-free LED flashlight
Tools have garnered praise for the torque they deliver
cons: The 18-volt lithium ion battery takes longer to charge
Charging dock has been known to die altogether

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life and feature rich.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Reliable. The included batteries are longer lasting when compared to other brands' included batts. *3.0 mAh vs 1.5 mAh. The blade locking device on the reciprocating saw is great because no Allen wrench/hex key is needed like older recip. saws. Also works with all brands/manufacturers' blade types= a big time-saver and nice convenience. Def. recommended, especially at this price ($199- end of 2018).

product_meta.title: Hitachi KC18DG4L 18V Cordless 4 Piece Combo Kit, Hammer Drill, Impact Driver, Recip Saw, Flashlight, 2 Compact 3.0 Ah Lithium Ion Batteries, Lifetime Tool Warranty
product_meta.description: Covered by Hitachi's Lifetime Lithium Ion tool warranty, the KC18DG4L is an 18V 4-Piece Combo Kit that includes a hammer drill (DV18DGL), an impact driver (WH18DGL), a reciprocating saw (CR18DGL), and an LED flashlight (UB18DEL). Included alongside the tools are two 18V Lithium Ion Compact 3.0Ah batteries (BSL1830C) for less weight in a more compact size than a traditional 3.0Ah Li-ion battery, while also providing fade-free power and protection from over-charge, over-discharge and over-load. Other items included are a battery charger, carrying bag and a Phillips #2 driver bit.
feature_bullets: Hitachi Power Tools has renamed to Metabo HPT. Same great tools, with only a new name.
Kit includes (2) 18V Lithium Ion Compact 3.0Ah Slide Type batteries BSL1830C (339782) for less weight in a more compact size than a traditional 3.0Ah Li ion battery
Kit includes the DV18DGL 18V Lithium Ion Hammer Drill that boasts 487 inches/pounds of torque in an ergonomic, lightweight (3.8 pounds) design
Kit includes the WH18DGL 18V Lithium Ion Impact Driver that weighs only 3.1 pounds, yet still delivers 1,280 inches/pounds of driving torque for heavier applications
Kit includes the CR18DGL 18V Lithium Ion Reciprocating Saw has a 1 inches stroke length and 3,300 SPM to allow for easy and fast cutting
Kit includes the UB18DEL 18V Lithium Ion LED Flashlight for high visibility in a free standing design for convenience
Kit also includes the UC18YKSL quick charger, Phillips #2 Driver bit and carrying bag
Covered by Hitachi's Lifetime Lithium Ion tool warranty, 2 Year Lithium Ion battery warranty and 1 Year charger warranty
